title: Red Bull and Brightline Announce Immersive Train Experience for 2025 Ultra Music Festival
description: After debuting the experience in March 2024, Brightline and Red Bull are again teaming up again to further enhance the Ultra festival experience.
author: Ansh Talim
excerpt: After debuting the experience in March 2024, Brightline and Red Bull are again teaming up again to further enhance the Ultra festival experience.

html:
After debuting the experience in March 2024, Brightline and Red Bull are again teaming up again to further enhance the Ultra festival experience.

After debuting the experience in March 2024, Brightline and Red Bull are again teaming up again to further enhance the Ultra festival experience.

  • Home
  • EVENTS

With festival season fast approaching, Ultra Music Festival's 25th anniversary just became even more enticing. Brightline and Red Bull have announced the return of "NEXT STOP: ULTRA," an immersive train experience that takes festivalgoers from Orlando to Miami.

This one-of-a-kind journey isn’t just about getting there—it’s about setting the tone for an unforgettable weekend. Passengers riding into the event on the bespoke "NEXT STOP: ULTRA" train will experience an immersive experience upon boarding, featuring DJs, curated food and beverages, and surprises throughout the trip.

Red Bull and Brightline are offering two distinct cars this year. Those who want to ease into the festival vibe can choose to ride in a brand-new "chill car," which is designed for relaxation through lounge mixes. Those who are looking to get the party started early, however, can enjoy the high-energy music selections in the other cars from yesteryear.

Tickets are on sale now starting at $183 for a one-way ticket from Miami to Orlando. The train departs from Orlando at 12:50pm on Friday, March 28th before arriving in Miami just in time for Ultra's doors to open at 4pm.
